prototypes.prototype: Month_Name as C = CMONTH(D date[,L localized])
Month_Name as C = CMONTH( D time as T[, localized as L] )

argument.name: date
argument.description: A variable containing a date value or a character string containing a legitimate representation of a date value ( ISDATE (Date_Value) = .T.).

argument.name: time
argument.description: A variable containing a date time value.

argument.name: localized
argument.description: Logical. A variable containing .T. if a localized month is requested.

page.description: Returns the name of the month for the specified date, if optional localized flag is true, report the localized day name.
page.discussion: CMONTH() returns the Month_Name in the specified Date or Date_Time. If the optional localized flag is true, report the localized day name. (Localized flag requires Version 10.5 or later).
page.example: cmonth(START) -> "March", if START contains 03/07/95 cmonth( ctod( "05/25/95") ) -> "May"
